sentence__0: The bills are flat on the bottom and curved at the top.
sentence__1: The bills are 1/2 as long as the head is wide.
sentence__2: The bills do not have straight sides, that is they are not a perfect cone.
sentence__3: The tailfeathers are equal in length to the body minus the head.
sentence__4: The belly is almost always a solid, muted gray color.
sentence__5: The wing feathers are dark gray with off-white ends, creating a fan pattern.
sentence__6: The crown is always a smooth semicircle.
sentence__7: The crown is the same color as the back of the bird, gray.
sentence__8: The birds are almost always gray.
sentence__9: The belly is always full and round, and the back straight.
